titles.title: Community-Based Workforce Development Act
Community-Based Workforce Development Act
A bill to amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to award grants to States to develop, convene, expand, or implement industry or sector partnerships, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Community-Based Workforce Development Act
This bill provides grants to expand workforce training programs for high-skill, high-wage, or in-demand industry sectors.
